attributes.action:
Anna Soubry and Dominic Grieve meeting to advise 
Barnier how to stop Brexit
attributes.background:
The people of England voted to leave the EU by a clear majority 
and are being constantly expose to individuals going about 
Showing disrespect to the outcome of the Brexit Vote.
We in England want to remain a democracy not dominated by
Individuals self interest Such as the 2 individuals above.
